snippet.title: Persona 4 Arena Ultimax: Full Trailer
snippet.description:
The ultimate tag team returns to present another super-heated battle.  New characters have entered the arena.  The fight moves outside the TV...to the real world! 

Now avaialble for PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360.
http://atlus.com/p4au/purchase.html

For more information: http://www.atlus.com/p4au/
